column4: Help please. I accidentally entered a command intended for someone else in this chat and now my graphics card is not detected at boot. I think I have accidentally reconfigured it but I dont know how to recover. The computer starts in low graphics mode
Bazhang: I think that may be what I did that caused the problem in the first place
you should see a backup of xorg.conf in same dir as /etc/X11  it maybe named xorg.conf.DATEHERE
